DOC.criteria: 1 . Was expose AIN457 placebo study CAIN457B2201 complete CAIN457B2201 study , include Visit 10 ( week 24 ) . 1 . Malignancy diagnose since enrollment core study ( except successfullytreated basal squamous cell carcinoma skin ) . 8 . A new diagnosis diabetes 9 .
